values.name: is_permutation
values.docstring:
|
 检查两个数组是否为排列。

 # Example
 ```
 let a = [1, 2, 3, 4]
 let b = [3, 1, 4, 2]
 let result = is_permutation(a, b)
 println(result) // 输出: true
 ```
 @alert unsafe "如果数组长度不一致，将返回 false。"
values.signature: fn is_permutation[T : Compare + Eq](arr1 : Array[T], arr2 : Array[T], start1~ : Int = .., end1~ : Int = .., start2~ : Int = ..) -> Bool
